reviews.text: Excellent resort. Beautiful coastline. Great restaurants and bars.

It is a basic National Rail station which lacks the facilities of bigger terminus stations. However, where this stations stands out is its looks. It is one of the prettiest stations I have ever seen and would recommend those visiting the area to go and check it out.
A very nice little station and well maintained. Probably the nicest of all of train stations I’ve come across in this region

A cozy station full of character that has regular trains going to various destinations within Devon as well further afield areas such as Cornwall in one direction, plus Somerset, Wales & London in others, nice staff to assist you on your travels whilst on your specified platform after purchasing a ticket from the manned kiosk, there is also a ticket machine on the platform over the bridge to collect pre-paid tickets or to just purchase tickets if you're in a hurry and the kiosk has long queues.
Excellent little Train station with very helpful staff.
